title: U.S. air conditioners shipments 2001 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of shipments in millions, with a total of 19 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2019 to 2010.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2010 to 2005.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2005 to 2003.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2003 to 2001.
gold: Around 5.4 million air conditioners ( A/Cs ) were shipped in the United States during 2019 . Total shipment figures fluctuate year to year , but generally fall between 3.5 and 6 million , with a few notable exceptions such as the 6.47 million sold in 2005 . Air conditioner market Having been invented over a century ago , air conditioner products comprise a mature and relatively stable market of the overall household appliance industry .
